title: Backing Up Spotify
author: vitplister
aiHeadline: Because your music taste is the only thing more important than your soul, here's how to back up your Spotify playlists for eternity.

title: Airbus to migrate critical apps to a sovereign Euro cloud
author: saubeidl
aiHeadline: Airbus is finally taking its data to a cloud that's as secure as a European vaultâ€”because who needs American tech when you can have French cheese and German efficiency?

title: NTP at NIST Boulder Has Lost Power
author: lpage
aiHeadline: The world's timekeeping just got a little more unreliable as NIST Boulder's NTP loses power, proving that even time can't be trusted these days.

title: Go ahead, self-host Postgres
author: pavel_lishin
aiHeadline: Self-hosting Postgres is fun until someone realizes they're now the IT department, so enjoy your DIY database management adventure!

title: Privacy doesn't mean anything anymore, anonymity does
author: ybceo
aiHeadline: Privacy is dead, long live anonymity! Because who needs to keep their data secret when you can just be a faceless entity in the digital void?
